name: Higher or Lower card game
description:
Try out your luck in the free game Higher or Lower!
Do you play Solitaire Black Jack Pyramid or any other logical puzzles? Try a Higher Lower card game!
Can you guess what the next card is? Is it higher or lower, red or black? Maybe you can predict card suits? Let’s try it now!

As easy as Solitaire or Black Jack and brings so much fun! Each card brings you closer to the title of the best player of all time.
Never played any casual card games before? Complete a quick tutorial - it’s easy peasy. It's a casual and entertaining free game for everyone.

Highlights:
• Guess the cards and get rewards - the more difficult the condition is, the bigger the reward.
• Customize cards and desks - different options to suit all tastes.
• Beat your luck - find your own unique way to play and win.

Big challenge is waiting for you. Start your adventure and earn thousands of gold coins! Good luck!

DOWNLOAD NOW and enjoy the fun game for free!

Thank you for installing this great game. Please don't forget to rate our game after playing!
